text: nam uddesiccirunnuvenkil ava (drstantannal) mulam avann uyarcca nalkumayirunnu. pakse, avan bhumiyalekk (at sasvatamanenna bhavena) tiriyukayum avanre tannistatte pinparrukayuman ceytatâ€Œ. appeal avanre upama oru nayayutet pealeyakunnu. ni atine akramiccal at nav tukkiyitum. ni atine verute vittalum at nav tukkiyitum. atan nam'mute drstantannal nisedhicc talliyavarute upama. atinal (avarkkâ€Œ) i katha vivariccukeatukku. avar cinticcenn varam
